# scm_service_setting (Data Source)

ServiceSetting data source



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) UUID of the resource

### Optional

- `device` (String) The device in which the resource is defined
> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `folder` (String) The folder in which the resource is defined
> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `snippet` (String) The snippet in which the resource is defined
> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.

### Read-Only

- `encrypted_values` (Map of String, Sensitive) Map of sensitive values returned from the API.
- `services` (Attributes) Services (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--services))
- `tfid` (String) The Terraform ID.

<a id="nestedatt--services"></a>
### Nested Schema for `services`

Read-Only:

- `dns_setting` (Attributes) Dns setting (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--services--dns_setting))
- `fqdn_refresh_time` (Number) Fqdn refresh time
- `fqdn_stale_entry_timeout` (Number) Fqdn stale entry timeout
- `inline_cloud_proxy` (Boolean) Inline cloud proxy
- `lcaas_use_proxy` (Boolean) Lcaas use proxy
- `ntp_servers` (Attributes) Ntp servers (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--services--ntp_servers))
- `secure_proxy_password` (String, Sensitive) Secure proxy password
- `secure_proxy_port` (Number) Secure proxy port
- `secure_proxy_server` (String) Secure proxy server
- `secure_proxy_user` (String) Secure proxy user
- `server_verification` (Boolean) Server verification
- `update_server` (String) Update server
